name: Zombie jammer
description:
This is from the miz 1 Game Jam.

Made in Unity, Under 48 Hours

Zombie jammer

Zombie jammer is a top down shooter, no story. just a shooter. 

There are 5 levels in the entire game. some more difficult than the others, last one being an endless mode

To beat a level you need to survive a certain amount of time, depending on the level

Enemy types
  1. Red - a normal zombie
  2. Pink - a huge zombie, moves slow, but has alot of HP
  3. Dark red - fast but low HP
  4.  Gold - a mix between Pink and Red
Difficulty

The difficulty in this game is quite hard. you die in 1 hit and restart the level from scrath.

Quote's from friends  I hate this game. You owe me a new finger.  -the epster
